name: Inspiringphrases
0:
”Alexa, open inspiring phrases”
”Alexa, start inspiring phrases”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: inspiring phrases
des:
Ask for phrases that inspire, and have access to reflections from thinkers of different times. 

Inspiring phrases sharpen creativity and intelligence.

To start, just say "Alexa, open phrases that inspire" to get a sentence.

At any time, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop".
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
